title: OpenAI introduces ChatGPT agent
summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT agent capabilities that combine reasoning and action for multi-step tasks.

title: OpenAI Operator integrated into ChatGPT agent mode
summary: Operator browser-based capabilities were integrated into ChatGPT agent mode and standalone Operator was sunset.

title: Amazon Bedrock multi-agent collaboration reaches GA
summary: AWS announced general availability of Bedrock multi-agent collaboration with observability and infrastructure-as-code support.

title: Salesforce launches Agentforce 2dx
summary: Salesforce introduced Agentforce 2dx with proactive autonomous agents, developer tooling, and marketplace distribution.

title: Vertex AI Agent Engine is generally available
summary: Google Cloud announced Vertex AI Agent Engine GA, signaling production maturity for managed agent deployment.

title: Copilot Studio autonomous agents now generally available
summary: Microsoft announced GA for autonomous agents in Copilot Studio with trigger-based event handling and execution visibility.
